title: The Greatest Home Run Hitter Ever
description:
Karl Ravech joins Buster to break down Aaron Judge’s hunt for 62 homers, discuss if Judge is having the greatest single season ever, breaking down the Royals firing Dayton Moore, and share what team has the highest steaks in the NL East. Then, Jess Mendoza joins discussing her take on Dave Robert's comments on Craig Kimbrel's performance, how she almost crashed her car following Aaron Judge’s historic year, and shares who her key player is in the Mariners playoff race.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
